reviewText:
I coach lacrosse and "foundation" is a poor word to describe this video. Geared towards 1st year players, it's really slow to develop so I would say 5th graders should be watching this. The title and desciption is misleading.

I did learn beginner tips but zero helped me in the field.

DVD provides good overview of footwork, passing and catching with the long pole, basic stick checks and some general defensive philosophy. Because it is based on Tierny's Princeton zone defense system, there is not a lot of 1-1 or traditional defense instruction for youth players that are in a more conventional defensive system.
